ref: 1791 uttāra m. ʻ landing, delivery ʼ MBh. &rcirclemacr Pa. Pk. uttāra -- m. ʻ crossing over ʼ; Pk. uṭṭāra -- m. ʻ landing place, bank (of a lake, &c.) ʼ perh. X *uṭṭārayati ʻ pulls up to ʼ; S. otāro m. ʻ place for putting up in, an inn ʼ; P. utār m. ʻ descent ʼ, ˚rā m. ʻ alighting, camping, stopping place, ransom ʼ; Ku. utār, ˚ro ʻ going to a lower country, copy ʼ; B. utar -- thānā ʻ resthouse, inn ʼ; H. utār m. ʻ ford, ferry, declivity, decrease ʼ, ˚rā m. ʻ descent (to a river), crossing, halting place ʼ; G. utār m. ʻ ford, fare for journey, antidote ʼ, ˚rɔ m. ʻ lodgings, residence as a guest ʼ; M. utār m. ʻ ford, ferry fare ʼ, ˚rā m. ʻ removing sickness by a charm ʼ.
